name: Hugo the Worm
description:
Hugo the Worm is a mobile runner game in 2D. Your objective is to survive as long as you can by avoiding the waste left in the ground by humans.

Dodge the garbage and eat the bread crumbs, apple cores and eggshells to earn the most points.
Be careful, if you hit a trash, you die ! 

Gameplay :

Touch the screen to dig down and release it to go up.

The Team :

Nicolas VILLARD : Producer

Léonard VUILLOT : Gameplay/Tools/UI Programmer

Robin LACOMBLEZ : Gameplay/Graphics Programmer

Alexandre ROBLIN : Game Artist

Lucas SANCHEZ : Lead Game Designer

Laura DELIGNIÈRES : Game Designer
